25.ara-name: كتاب الأطعمة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik: "I saw the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) taking from the sides around the dish - meaning the gourd. Since then I still like it." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih. This Hadith has been reported through more than one route from Anas bin Malik

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي أَكْلِ الدُّبَّاءِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Eating Gourd
